headline: Software Stocks Have Taken a Beating This Year. Here’s What’s Ahead.
summary: Many are now offering a range of AI products in hopes of boosting productivity and reshaping how enterprises operate.  Salesforce’s  third-quarter revenue just missed expectations, but earnings were above consensus and guidance was strong.  Creative software company  Adobe  also had a solid third-quarter and provided better-than-expected financial guidance for the year ahead.

headline: Is Salesforce Still Attractive After AI Driven Push and Recent Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether Salesforce is still worth buying after its big run over the last few years, you are not alone. This article aims to unpack what the current share price really implies about its long term value. Despite being down about 23.0% year to date and 28.3% over the last year, the stock is still up roughly 99.4% over three years and 13.6% over five years. This tells us sentiment has swung hard, but the long term growth story is far from dead. Recent moves in the share...
